column5: Haven't seen the episode but I have to vote for piranhas, I have 15 of em and they are quite the feeders. Here is a video of em eating 1/2 lb of rainbow fillets  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gmY6xe1qUxM
So do you stick your arm in that tank to clean it.. or use the sponge brush ?? lol
I use a siphon hose and only after they eat, wouldn't put my hand in if they were hungry
watched the marathon episodes last night on discovery, they were all awesome  the amazon river is fill of nasty creatures that want to eat you
My favorite is the one with the wels catfish.
they are all awesome, very good show
